links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[8 July]] [[1973]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Norman Power]]'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 773</ref> The letter was published in 1975 in the journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]''.<ref>J.R.R. Tolkien, "Letter to Canon Power," [http://journals.tolkiensociety.org/mallorn/issue/view/10 ''Mallorn'' No. 9], p. 19</ref>

*'''Description and Contents:''' Tolkien sends Power a signature, a spare copy of a publication, and "''comments on his childhood in [[Birmingham]].''"<ref name=CG/>

{{references}}
